Articles.Content: One of my engineers is named "Kerble Kerman". So close.

I once got Billy-Bobo and his brother Billy-something.

I also have Anny Kerman, she is my test pilot for test and turns out she has BadS turned on randomly.

i had Cambo Kerman for a long time as a shuttle test pilot during the beta.

ohhhhh the stuff i put him through. i have been considering trying to bring him back, how do you modify a kerbals name in game? (or create a kerbal with the desired name)

EDIT

beta whatever it was before 1.0 back during i think it was .23 or .24
Unicode Kerman
Kevin Kerman
Kerbal Kerman, in one of my old saves. I killed him in a mun landing...

I quite like German Kerman (possibly a friend of Wernher Von Kerman)

German is actually a legit name in German speaking countries. Wait, that sounds dumb. Let me write it in German: "In deutschsprachigen LÃƒÂ¤ndern gibt es den Namen German."
Dunman Kerman and Obdorf Kerman
Billybob Kerman
By far the most interesting name I've seen is Langertrix Kermin, one of my tourists. I liked it so much I named one of my ships the Langertrix
You can theoretically get Elvis Kerman. I plan to add him to the save file along with Luke Skywalker and Marty McFly.
I have Gillian Kerman. She's currently stuck on the Mun, due to me forgetting to put parachutes on the starfighter she was testing.
Scott is the coolest Kerman I got, pretty cool on how he is an engineer too haha.
I have two scientists called Seemore and Adwell. Seems appropriate.

Well, for me, the most unforgettable one was the head of my spaceplane program, Dodos Kerman. Dodos took many craft to orbit and back, pioneering the SSTO station refueling program. He now languishes in an old, no-longer-used save.

He has apparently escaped from that situation and has shown up in my campaign!
I used to have Hermes Kerman, but his capsule exploded due to overheating during a descent from orbit with ship named... Hermes

Luke and Ledi kerman...

Is that some kind of sign?

I think YES!!!

Wait How many names do a kerbal have? 2 (first and last)

How much is 2? 2!!! or two 1 <--Remember that

^-----------------------

Luke and Ledi has 4 letters, 4+4=8 |

Remember the 1 we discovered above?-----------|

ledi is a bad name, what else is bad? too little or minus: -

1-8=7

What is ksp all about? space exploration!!!

But remember the minus? What is NOT space exploration? STAR WARS!!!

star wars 7 confirmed... or wait its already confirmed? ok.... eeeeh jedis end lukes is also confirmed...

Edited October 29, 2015 by Fisk02
And I certainly don't want to share a capsule with Richgas. Not hired!
I hired a "Tomford Kerman" because his name reminded me ot Tom Ford, the journaist and tv presenter.

And I certainly don't want to share a capsule with Richgas. Not hired!

There's quite a lot of Kerbals with -gas in their name.

I wonder if that's why the entire race is so green in their faces?
I just rescued Haytrid Kerman from LKO, and she's a scientist... Not a scrap of stupid in her. If I ever get Enemy Kerman those two will probably mutiny...
I once got a German Kerman.
"Sklax Kerman"
Billy-Bobcus Kerman
Piper Kerman.
